{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgate |model=SG-1000 |revision=(F300) |asin=B06Y49VS7W |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=ADI Engineering |price=149 |est_release_date=04/2017 |pcb_id=80100-0140-F300 |type=home security gateway |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM3352 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC04G-M627 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Micro-B (Female),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ9031RN |eth_chip3_brand=Microchip |eth_chip3_model=KSZ9031RN |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Single-Chip USB to UART Bridge;Silicon Labs;CP2104;;1;,,, Low-Voltage Quadruple FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CBTLV3126;;1;,,, Low-Power Dual Voltage Comparator;STMicro;LM2903;;1; |flags=heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;2016.03; |stock_os=FreeBSD;11.2-RELEASE-p3;pfsense 2.4.4; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=pfsense |oui_eth=40:BD:32 }} {{TagLine|micro-Firewall}} :[https://docs.netgate.com/pfsense/en/latest/solutions/sg-1000/index.html Product Docs]
*"PCB 80100-0140-F300", "PCA 80300-0140" and "Made in China" :are silk-screened on bottom of board ([http://www.adiengineering.com ''ADI Engineering'']).
{{See also|VeloCloud EDGE 510-AC|VeloCloud EDGE 540-AC (5X0)}}
===Links=== *[https://www.servethehome.com/netgate-sg-1000-freebsd-based-pfsense-arm-first-look/ ''Netgate SG-1000 (FreeBSD based pfSense on ARM)'' on '''ServeTheHome''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' AM3352 [[ARM]] (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *Storage: 4GB (eMMC) Flash, TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port, 1x USB 2.0 (via 5-pin 0.1" header) *Power Source: 5V/3A via barrel
===See also=== :;[https://www.amazon.com/stores/Netgate/page/C919CF36-E0BC-4E4E-9C12-431A2ADD84EA?ref_=ast_bln Netgate Hardware Specifications] • [https://www.netgate.com/appliances#compare-products Compare Products] *[[Netgate SG-1000]] • [[TI]] AM3352 [[ARM]] (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *[[Netgate SG-1100]] • [[ARM]] (Cortex-A53) (Dual) 2x @1.2GHz *[[Netgate SG-2100]] • [[ARM]] (Cortex-A53) (Dual) 2x @1.2GHz *[[Netgate SG-3100]] • [[ARM]] (Cortex-A9) (Dual) 2x @1.6GHz *[[Netgate SG-4100]] • [[Intel Atom]] C3338R (QAT) 2x @1.8GHz *[[Netgate SG-5100]] • [[Intel Atom]] C3558 (Quad) 4x @2.2GHz *[[Netgate SG-6100]] • [[Intel Atom]] C3558 (Quad) 4x @2.2GHz *[[Netgate SG-7100]] • [[Intel Atom]] C3558 (Quad) 4x @2.2GHz
